job_tasks.phrase: Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of AI models, specifically deep learning and LLM applications, which falls under the definition of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with LLM providers, such as OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.
job_tasks.justification: Interacting with LLM providers implies working with their models, which is a core aspect of prompt engineering and leveraging LLM capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Support the development of interactive dashboards
job_tasks.justification: Developing dashboards, even if interactive, is a software development task that integrates with data or AI outputs.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI solutions into broader systems and ensuring they are robust and scalable, which is a core software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights understanding business needs and proposing AI solutions, aligning with the definition of business understanding and strategy.
Taking initiative to address business challenges falls under the broader umbrella of understanding business needs and driving solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
job_tasks.justification: Keeping abreast of AI and LLM developments is crucial for model development and fine-tuning, as it informs the choice and application of techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
job_tasks.justification: Developing training materials on AI/ML involves structuring and communicating technical knowledge, which is an aspect of software development and knowledge dissemination.

job_tasks.phrase: developing outstanding AI-enhanced market research solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This is a broad statement about creating solutions that are enhanced by AI, which is a software development and integration task.
This directly refers to the creation of AI solutions, fitting the definition of model development.
Directly relates to the application and development of LLM-based solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with Cloud Computing and Deployment (AWS, Azure and/or GCP)
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the practical aspects of deploying and managing AI solutions in cloud environments, which aligns with MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with web development frameworks such as Flask
job_tasks.justification: Flask is a web development framework, indicating a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with CI/CD and IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation etc.)
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD and IaC are core MLOps practices for automating deployment and infrastructure management.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with various teams and stakeholders.
This phrase directly indicates a requirement for initiative, which aligns with innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on continuous learning about business applications and proposing new solutions points to learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
soft_skills.justification: This is a clear indicator of the need to learn and adapt to new developments in the AI field.

soft_skills.phrase: Excellent written and oral communication skills in English
soft_skills.justification: This directly states the requirement for strong communication skills.

soft_skills.phrase: High value placed on taking initiative and ownership
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the value placed on initiative and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing deep learning powered AI, specifically LLM applications (1.B.1, 1.B.2), and requires experience with LLMs and LLM providers. It also includes significant software engineering tasks such as developing interactive dashboards, integrating solutions, and deploying applications using cloud services and MLOps practices (1.A.1, 1.A.2). The role also requires business understanding and proposing AI solutions (1.C.1). The balance of core AI/LLM development with software engineering and deployment tasks, focused on Generative AI, fits the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, providing specific tasks, required qualifications, and technologies. The responsibilities align well with the defined profiles, making the classification straightforward.
